languages.text: {n}Зверь с интересом наблюдает за вами. Где-то далеко вы слышите вой сирены и топот. Очень далеко, гораздо дальше, чем пыхтение ласеракса.{/n}
{n}The beast watches you avidly. You hear sirens and pounding footsteps somewhere in the distance. It sounds very far away, much farther than the panting lacerax in front of you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Зверь с интересом наблюдает за вами. Где-то далеко вы слышите вой сирены и топот. Очень далеко, гораздо дальше, чем пыхтение ласеракса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The beast watches you avidly. You hear sirens and pounding footsteps somewhere in the distance. It sounds very far away, much farther than the panting lacerax in front of you.{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleBeastCommon

traits.speaker: JungleBeastCommon

traits.locale_text: {n}The beast watches you avidly. You hear sirens and pounding footsteps somewhere in the distance. It sounds very far away, much farther than the panting lacerax in front of you.{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleBeastCommon

languages.text: {n}这头猛兽以热切的目光注视着你。你听到远处传来了警笛声和咚咚的脚步声，但那些声音实在是太遥远了，比你面前这头喘着粗气的异虎要远太多了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beast watches you avidly. You hear sirens and pounding footsteps somewhere in the distance. It sounds very far away, much farther than the panting lacerax in front of you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这头猛兽以热切的目光注视着你。你听到远处传来了警笛声和咚咚的脚步声，但那些声音实在是太遥远了，比你面前这头喘着粗气的异虎要远太多了。{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleBeastCommon

languages.text: {n} 獣は熱心にあなたを見ている。サイレンの音とドタドタという足音が遠くから聞こえる。目の前でかすかに唸り声をあげているレースラックスよりもずっと遠くからだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beast watches you avidly. You hear sirens and pounding footsteps somewhere in the distance. It sounds very far away, much farther than the panting lacerax in front of you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n} 獣は熱心にあなたを見ている。サイレンの音とドタドタという足音が遠くから聞こえる。目の前でかすかに唸り声をあげているレースラックスよりもずっと遠くからだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleBeastCommon

languages.text: {n}La bestia te mira con avidez. Oyes sirenas y gente corriendo a lo lejos. Pero el sonido está mucho más lejos que el lacerax jadeante que tienes delante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beast watches you avidly. You hear sirens and pounding footsteps somewhere in the distance. It sounds very far away, much farther than the panting lacerax in front of you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La bestia te mira con avidez. Oyes sirenas y gente corriendo a lo lejos. Pero el sonido está mucho más lejos que el lacerax jadeante que tienes delante.{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleBeastCommon

languages.text: {n}L'animal vous observe en se pourléchant les babines. Vous entendez des sirènes et le bruit de pas qui accourent. Ils vous paraissent encore très loin, bien plus loin que le lacérax haletant qui se tient devant vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beast watches you avidly. You hear sirens and pounding footsteps somewhere in the distance. It sounds very far away, much farther than the panting lacerax in front of you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'animal vous observe en se pourléchant les babines. Vous entendez des sirènes et le bruit de pas qui accourent. Ils vous paraissent encore très loin, bien plus loin que le lacérax haletant qui se tient devant vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleBeastCommon

languages.text: {n}Die Bestie beobachtet dich aufmerksam. Irgendwo in der Ferne hörst du Sirenen und donnernde Schritte. Es klingt so, als wären sie sehr weit weg, viel weiter weg als der schnaufende Lacerax vor dir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beast watches you avidly. You hear sirens and pounding footsteps somewhere in the distance. It sounds very far away, much farther than the panting lacerax in front of you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Bestie beobachtet dich aufmerksam. Irgendwo in der Ferne hörst du Sirenen und donnernde Schritte. Es klingt so, als wären sie sehr weit weg, viel weiter weg als der schnaufende Lacerax vor dir.{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleBeastCommon

languages.text: {n}Hayvan, aç bakışlarla seni izliyor. Uzakta bir yerde alarmların çaldığını ve adımların yaklaştığını duyabiliyorsun. Sesler çok uzaktan geliyor gibi. Önündeki hırıldayan laseraksa kıyasla çok uzaktan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beast watches you avidly. You hear sirens and pounding footsteps somewhere in the distance. It sounds very far away, much farther than the panting lacerax in front of you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hayvan seni aç bakışlarla izliyor. Uzakta bir yerde alarmların çaldığını ve adım seslerinin yaklaştığını duyabiliyorsun. Sesler çok uzaktan geliyor gibi. Önündeki nefes nefese laserakstan çok daha uzaktan.{/n}
traits.speaker: JungleBeastCommon
